page.title: 05SENIOR CITIZENS LUNCHES.
page.content: Every week senior citizens come to school for lunch.We are lucky,we have our own cook and the lunches are very tasty. The old people are so interesting and we learn to understand each other.We like to think that they know we care about them.Some of us entertain and others serve them. When they have finished their lunch,they have a cup of tea and a chat.Then we show them our work and then wave them good bye. We think it is lovely having old people in to school because they are so nice and we like to help. It is really good because they do not have to make their own dinner or wash their own dishes.
